019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.io.Writer;
027import java.lang.reflect.UndeclaredThrowableException;
028import java.net.UnixDomainSocketAddress;
029import java.nio.file.Files;
030import java.nio.file.Path;
031import java.util.LinkedList;
032import java.util.List;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Queue;
035import java.util.logging.Level;
036import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpCommand;
037import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpGuestGetOsinfo;
038import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.GuestAgentCommand;
039import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.OsinfoEvent;
040import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.VserportChangeEvent;
041import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
042import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
043import org.jgrapes.core.EventPipeline;
044import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
045import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
046import org.jgrapes.core.events.Stop;
047import org.jgrapes.io.events.Closed;
048import org.jgrapes.io.events.ConnectError;
049import org.jgrapes.io.events.Input;
050import org.jgrapes.io.events.OpenSocketConnection;
051import org.jgrapes.io.util.ByteBufferWriter;
052import org.jgrapes.io.util.LineCollector;
053import org.jgrapes.net.SocketIOChannel;
054import org.jgrapes.net.events.ClientConnected;
055import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
056
057/**
058 * A component that handles the communication over the guest agent
059 * socket.
060 * 
061 * If the log level for this class is set to fine, the messages 
062 * exchanged on the monitor socket are logged.
063 */
064@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
065public class GuestAgentClient extends Component {
066
067    private static ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
068
069    private EventPipeline rep;
070    private Path socketPath;
071    private List<Map<String, String>> guestAgentCmds;
072    private String guestAgentCmd;
073    private SocketIOChannel gaChannel;
074    private final Queue<QmpCommand> executing = new LinkedList<>();
075
076    /**
077     * Instantiates a new guest agent client.
078     *
079     * @param componentChannel the component channel
080     * @param guestAgentCmds 
081     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
082     */
083    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AssignmentToNonFinalStatic",
084        "PMD.ConstructorCallsOverridableMethod" })
085    public GuestAgentClient(Channel componentChannel) throws IOException {
086        super(componentChannel);
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * As the initial configuration of this component depends on the 
091     * configuration of the {@link Runner}, it doesn't have a handler 
092     * for the {@link ConfigurationUpdate} event. The values are 
093     * forwarded from the {@link Runner} instead.
094     *
095     * @param socketPath the socket path
096     * @param guestAgentCmds 
097     * @param powerdownTimeout 
098     */
099    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
100    /* default */ void configure(Path socketPath, ArrayNode guestAgentCmds) {
101        this.socketPath = socketPath;
102        try {
103            this.guestAgentCmds = mapper.convertValue(guestAgentCmds,
104                mapper.constructType(getClass()
105                    .getDeclaredField("guestAgentCmds").getGenericType()));
106        } catch (IllegalArgumentException | NoSuchFieldException
107                | SecurityException e) {
108            // Cannot happen
109        }
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * Handle the start event.
114     *
115     * @param event the event
116     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
117     */
118    @Handler
119    public void onStart(Start event) throws IOException {
120        rep = event.associated(EventPipeline.class).get();
121        if (socketPath == null) {
122            return;
123        }
124        Files.deleteIfExists(socketPath);
125    }
126
127    /**
128     * When the virtual serial port "channel0" has been opened,
129     * establish the connection by opening the socket.
130     *
131     * @param event the event
132     */
133    @Handler
134    public void onVserportChanged(VserportChangeEvent event) {
135        if ("channel0".equals(event.id()) && event.isOpen()) {
136            fire(new OpenSocketConnection(
137                UnixDomainSocketAddress.of(socketPath))
138                    .setAssociated(GuestAgentClient.class, this));
139        }
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Check if this is from opening the monitor socket and if true,
144     * save the socket in the context and associate the channel with
145     * the context. Then send the initial message to the socket.
146     *
147     * @param event the event
148     * @param channel the channel
149     */
150    @SuppressWarnings("resource")
151    @Handler
152    public void onClientConnected(ClientConnected event,
153            SocketIOChannel channel) {
154        event.openEvent().associated(GuestAgentClient.class).ifPresent(qm -> {
155            gaChannel = channel;
156            channel.setAssociated(GuestAgentClient.class, this);
157            channel.setAssociated(Writer.class, new ByteBufferWriter(
158                channel).nativeCharset());
159            channel.setAssociated(LineCollector.class,
160                new LineCollector()
161                    .consumer(line -> {
162                        try {
163                            processGuestAgentInput(line);
164                        } catch (IOException e) {
165                            throw new UndeclaredThrowableException(e);
166                        }
167                    }));
168            fire(new GuestAgentCommand(new QmpGuestGetOsinfo()));
169        });
170    }
171
172    /**
173     * Called when a connection attempt fails.
174     *
175     * @param event the event
176     * @param channel the channel
177     */
178    @Handler
179    public void onConnectError(ConnectError event, SocketIOChannel channel) {
180        event.event().associated(GuestAgentClient.class).ifPresent(qm -> {
181            rep.fire(new Stop());
182        });
183    }
184
185    /**
186     * Handle data from qemu monitor connection.
187     *
188     * @param event the event
189     * @param channel the channel
190     */
191    @Handler
192    public void onInput(Input<?> event, SocketIOChannel channel) {
193        if (channel.associated(GuestAgentClient.class).isEmpty()) {
194            return;
195        }
196        channel.associated(LineCollector.class).ifPresent(collector -> {
197            collector.feed(event);
198        });
199    }
200
201    private void processGuestAgentInput(String line)
202            throws IOException {
203        logger.fine(() -> "guest agent(in): " + line);
204        try {
205            var response = mapper.readValue(line, ObjectNode.class);
206            if (response.has("return") || response.has("error")) {
207                QmpCommand executed = executing.poll();
208                logger.fine(
209                    () -> String.format("(Previous \"guest agent(in)\" is "
210                        + "result from executing %s)", executed));
211                if (executed instanceof QmpGuestGetOsinfo) {
212                    processOsInfo(response);
213                }
214            }
215        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
216            throw new IOException(e);
217        }
218    }
219
220    private void processOsInfo(ObjectNode response) {
221        var osInfo = new OsinfoEvent(response.get("return"));
222        var osId = osInfo.osinfo().get("id").asText();
223        for (var cmdDef : guestAgentCmds) {
224            if (osId.equals(cmdDef.get("osId"))
225                || "*".equals(cmdDef.get("osId"))) {
226                guestAgentCmd = cmdDef.get("executable");
227                break;
228            }
229        }
230        if (guestAgentCmd == null) {
231            logger.warning(() -> "No guest agent command for OS " + osId);
232        } else {
233            logger.fine(() -> "Guest agent command for OS " + osId
234                + " is " + guestAgentCmd);
235        }
236        rep.fire(osInfo);
237    }
238
239    /**
240     * On closed.
241     *
242     * @param event the event
243     */
244    @Handler
245    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidSynchronizedStatement",
246        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
247    public void onClosed(Closed<?> event, SocketIOChannel channel) {
248        channel.associated(QemuMonitor.class).ifPresent(qm -> {
249            gaChannel = null;
250        });
251    }
252
253    /**
254     * On guest agent command.
255     *
256     * @param event the event
257     */
258    @Handler
259    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition",
260        "PMD.AvoidSynchronizedStatement" })
261    public void onGuestAgentCommand(GuestAgentCommand event) {
262        var command = event.command();
263        logger.fine(() -> "guest agent(out): " + command.toString());
264        String asText;
265        try {
266            asText = command.asText();
267        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
268            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
269                () -> "Cannot serialize Json: " + e.getMessage());
270            return;
271        }
272        synchronized (executing) {
273            gaChannel.associated(Writer.class).ifPresent(writer -> {
274                try {
275                    executing.add(command);
276                    writer.append(asText).append('\n').flush();
277                } catch (IOException e) {
278                    // Cannot happen, but...
279                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e, e::getMessage);
280                }
281            });
282        }
283    }
284}
